details:
It was discovered that composer, a dependency manager for PHP, did
not properly sanitize Mercurial URLs, which could lead to arbitrary
code execution.


For Debian 9 stretch, this problem has been fixed in version
1.2.2-1+deb9u1.


We recommend that you upgrade your composer packages.


For the detailed security status of composer please refer to
its security tracker page at:
<https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/composer>


Further information about Debian LTS security advisories, how to apply
these updates to your system and frequently asked questions can be
found at: <https://wiki.debian.org/LTS>
